reason: Bitcoin demonstrates strong resilience by returning to $70,000 after an early decline, reinforced by a significant $150,000 institutional price target from Bernstein. Increased institutional coverage of Bitcoin miners further validates the asset class, while the debunking of speculative rumors promotes more organic price discovery. Despite inherent crypto market volatility, the current momentum and institutional backing point towards continued upward pressure.
headlines: Farcaster founders join stablecoin startup Tempo after Neynar acquires social protocol
Bitcoin shakes off early decline, returns to $70,000 as Bernstein reiterates $150,000 outlook
Cipher Mining and TeraWulf are buys, MARA a sell, as Morgan Stanley begins bitcoin miner coverage
U.S. government isn't poised to sweep in with bitcoin buys, despite Jim Cramer rumor
MegaETH debuts mainnet as Ethereum scaling debate heats up
